title: Side Project Success
description: Launched a side project that accidentally gained 1,000+ users overnight in over 40 countries.
details: The project went viral on social media, requiring rapid infrastructure scaling and real-time support. It taught me invaluable lessons about server-side optimization and community management.

title: Rubik's Cube Record
description: Solved a Rubik's cube under 30 seconds (once, and never again).
details: Requires intense pattern recognition and finger dexterity. Achieving a sub-30 second solve was a milestone in dedicated practice and spatial reasoning.

title: Humor AI
description: Built a chatbot that responds with dad jokes only, using advanced NLP (or just a big JSON file).
details: A fun exploration into conversational UI. The goal was to create an interface that was intentionally 'bad' in a charming way.

title: Hackathon Endurance
description: Survived an all-nighter hackathon fueled purely by cold pizza and curiosity.
details: Collaboration under pressure. We built a prototype for a collaborative drawing app that used web sockets for real-time synchronization.

title: Rapid Deployment
description: Designed and deployed a personal website before finishing a single cup of coffee.
details: Leveraging boilerplate templates and cloud platforms to achieve high speed without compromising on initial visual appeal.

title: Open Source Contributor
description: Contributed code to an open source project at 2 AM, solving a long-standing edge case bugs.
details: The thrill of the pull request being merged. I focused on documentation and unit testing for a popular animation library.

title: 100-Day Challenge
description: Completed a 100-day coding challenge with a perfect streak and 10+ small projects shipped.
details: Discipline and consistency. Building a habit of shipping code every day significantly improved my problem-solving speed.

title: Curation Excellence
description: Created a music playlist that actually got compliments from the AUX controller.
details: Understanding audience taste and pacing. Curating experience through sound.
